text.section: Only a person who has entered into a contract with a governmental unit may have online access to the geographic data in a system under the terms of the contract.

If copy privileges are granted, the contract shall specify in addition to other conditions as may be required:
the circumstances and conditions under which data can be copied; and
the amount of compensation the governmental unit will receive for this privilege.

Online access:
shall be limited to read; and
may not include:
the ability to enter, alter, or delete data; or
access to information that would be denied under §§ 10-615 through 10-619 of this title.
